subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Unlike {{zh-l|*一}}, which was one horizontal stroke meaning one, {{lang|zh|十}} was originally simply a vertical stroke. In later forms {{lang|zh|一}} was added, forming a cross.

subSections.text:
* [[十字]] ([[십자]], ''sipja'') the character "十" or its shape, hence, [[cross]], [[chi]], [[X]], [[+]], etc.
* [[十中八九]] ([[십중팔구]], ''sipjung-palgu'') eight or nine out of ten.
* [[十干]] (십간)
* [[十二支]] (십이지)
